name: Catz Cozy Cafe
address: 1265 Arthur Street East (Arthur Street Medical Building)
text:
PEROGIE POUTINE
Perogie Poutine - $9.00

6 homemade potato and cheese perogies, topped with onions, bacon, cheese blend, and gravy.

Mexi Perogie Poutine - $8.75

6 perogies grilled with beef crumble, onions, bacon, and topped with queso cheese sauce.

SPECIALTIES
Whipped Out Shepherd's Pie - $12.00

Mashed potato, beef crumble, corn, cheese blend, and gravy, served with dinner roll.

Spaghetti and Home Made Meat Sauce - $10.00

Served with dinner roll.

ADD 4oz More in the Meat Sauce - $3.00

ADD 1 Piece Chicken Parmesan - $4.00

Ukrainian Plate - $14.00

4 perogies, 1 cabbage roll, 4oz sausage, topped with onions and sour cream, and dinner roll.

Perogies (6) - $6.75

Homemade potato and cheese, topped with onions and bacon, served with sour cream.

ADD Sausage - $3.00

Cabbage Roll - $6.00

With homemade tomato sauce.

Chili and a Bun - $8.00

BREAKFAST
Breakfast Sandwich or Wrap - $7.00

2 eggs, bacon, ham, or sausage with onion and cheese blend.

Lighter Side - $8.00

3 eggs, toast, 2 bacon, ham, or sausage, 4 perogies, or baked beans.

Classic - $9.50

2 eggs, toast, 3 bacon, ham, or sausage, with homefries, 4 perogies, or baked beans.

Cat's Big Breakfast - $10.00

3 eggs, toast, 3 bacon, ham, or sausage, with homefries, 4 perogies, or baked beans.

"SCRAMBLE IT THINGS UP" SCRAMBLERS
Meatlovers - $10.00

Homefries topped with 2 eggs scrambled, bacon, ham, sausage, topped with cheese blend and served with toast.

Western - $10.00

Homefries topped with 2 scrambled eggs, ham, onion, green pepper, topped with cheese blend, served with toast.

Veggie - $12.00

Homefries topped with 2 scrambled eggs, onion, green pepper, tomato, topped with cheese blend, served with toast.

Farmers - $13.00

Homefries topped with 2 scrambled eggs, bacon, ham, sausage, onion, green pepper, tomato, topped with cheese blend, served with toast.

Sweet Tooth
Fruit Pie (Apple, Cherry, Blueberry): $4.50 per slice

Cream Pies (Homemade Coconut, Chocolate, Butterscotch, Banana): $5.25 per slice

Ask about assorted other sweets

Beverage
Assorted can pop: $1.75

Assorted juice: $2.00

Water: $1.50

Tea (16oz cup): $1.50

Flavored Tea (16oz cup): $2.25

White or Chocolate Milk: $3.00

Coffee (Fresh Ground):

Small: $1.50

Medium: $1.75

Large: $2.00

Smoothies
Tropical: $7.00

Blueberry Pineapple: $7.00

Classic Green: $7.00

Classic Sandwich
(all served with creamy coleslaw)

Grill Cheese (cheese blend, mild cheese): $6.00

Grilled Ham and Swiss (4oz ham): $9.00

B.L.T. (bacon, lettuce, tomato): $9.50

Clubhouse (turkey, bacon, tomato, lettuce, cheddar cheese on 3 slices of toast): $11.00

Chicken Bacon Ranch Wrap (4oz grilled chicken, bacon, tomato, lettuce, cheddar blend, ranch dressing): $12.00

Panini Sandwich Melts
(all rye bread served with creamy coleslaw)

Reuben (corn-beef, sauerkraut, swiss cheese): $12.00

Turkey Cranberry (cranberry sauce, tomato, swiss, applewood smoked cheddar): $12.00

Burgers
5oz homemade beef patties served on kaiser bun with lettuce, tomato, natural-cut curly fries, and creamy coleslaw: $9.00

Add cheese: $1.50

Add bacon: $2.00
